description: Work with a team of senior engineers to design a architectural roadmap to enable future business features in the loss mitigation platform.

Work with a team of engineers to design, develop, test, and deploy solutions to support the loss mitigation process. Utilized Angular for the front-end, multiple REST API’s, and Window Services for the backend.

Work with a team of engineers to design, develop, test, and deploy solutions to support the loss mitigation process. Utilized AngularJS for the front-end, multiple REST API’s, and Window Services for the backend.
Work with customers during the design, development, and testing phase to create software solutions that interact between New World Systems and third-party solutions.
